newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.

text.p: These are the main headlines on Hungary's Kossuth Radio midday news. Reuters cannot vouch for their accuracy:
- Officials of the Hague International Court start their inspection at the Gabcikovo dam.
- Foreign Ministry spokesman said the Hague Court officials will inspect the Hungarian side of the dam on Thursday.
- The government will decide on Thursday whether to send troops to Albania.
- Malev starts Budapest-Timisoara and Budapest-Cluj flights.
- Malev flight prices went up 5 percent.
